controller.bounds

Class Bounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • controller.bounds.Bounds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Bounds
extends java.awt.Rectangle
implements java.io.Serializable
    Bounds is a utility for handling movement and intersection
    See Also:
    Rectangle, Serialized Form

      • Bounds

        public Bounds(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height)
        The four parameter constructor specifies x and y coordinates. It then generates a BoundsListener ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the Bound.
        y - the y coordinate of the Bound.
        width - The width of the entity.
        height - The height of the entity.
